Title: AI Image Generation
Description:
## User Story

As a user, 

I want to scan a song

So that I can receive an AI-generated image based on the song's context

## Description

The user should be able to scan a song with the app and automatically receive an AI-generated image based on the song's text.
Author: Vlad Popescu-Vifor

Title: History of images used with corresponding keywords
Description:
As a user,

I want to have access to an image history

So that I can view images that have been generated earlier.

## Description

The user should be able to view a history of the images that have been generated earlier based on the keywords entered.
Author: Vlad Popescu-Vifor

Title: Music recognition
Description:
As a user,

I want to scan a song

So that I can find out how it is called.

## Description
The app should be able to temporarily record songs, process the information using the ShazamSDK and find out the name and other details of the song.
Author: Vlad Popescu-Vifor

Title: Lyrics display and editing of keywords
Description:
As a user,

I want to scan a song

So that I can view its lyrics and be able to edit the keywords for the AI image generation

## Description
The app should send the name of the song obtained from the ShazamSDK to the lyrics.ovh API, so that the lyrics can be retrieved. The lyrics should then be displayed and the user should be able to edit the keywords created through NLP.
Author: Vlad Popescu-Vifor

Title: User can enter song manually
Description:
As a user,

I want to enter a song name manually

So that I can receive the lyrics and AI-generated image for this specific song.

## Description

The user will be able to enter a song name manually for it to be processed by NLP and afterwards be used for the image generation.
Author: Vlad Popescu-Vifor

Title: History of scanned songs
Description:
As a user,

I want to see a scanned song history

So that I can re-trigger the AI image generation for older songs.

## Description
The user will have access to a list containing the history of scanned songs and re-trigger the AI image generation process when selecting the older songs on the list.
Author: Vlad Popescu-Vifor

Title: Saving images to storage
Description:
As a user,

I want to be able to save the AI-generated image

So that I can view it on the mobile storage.

## Description
The user will be able to save the generated images to the mobile storage, if they want to.
Author: Vlad Popescu-Vifor

Title: NLP statistics on the lyrics
Description:
As a user,

I want to be able to view the results of the NLP on the text

So that I can have a statistical overview on the words.

## Description
The user should have an overview of the NLP results acquired from analyzing the song's lyrics.
Author: Vlad Popescu-Vifor
